alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Northumberland, southeastern Richmond and western Lancaster Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farnham around 1250 PM EDT. Robley, Lancaster, Morattico and Sharps around 115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lottsburg, Mollusk, Senora, Avalon, Nuttsville, Belle Isle State Park, Tidewater, Middletons Corner, Dodlyt and Lara. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
